text: Rômulo Aranha Estrela (born 5 March, 1984) is a Brazilian actor. He began his career in 2004 as an extra in Da Cor do Pecado, made other telenovelas of Globo as Paraíso Tropical and Duas Caras in 2007. He gained prominence by playing the mutant Draco in the telenovela Caminhos do Coração in 2008 and his sequel Promessas do Amor in 2009. In 2018 Rômulo played his first protagonist in the telenovela Deus Salve o Rei. Estrela was born in São Luís. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Title Role Notes 2003 Kubanacan Asylum nurse 2004 Da Cor do Pecado Minotauro Episode: "August 6-13" 2005 Essas Mulheres Romualdo 2006 Cobras e Lagartos Caveira Episode: August 25" Pé na Jaca Playboy Por Toda a Minha Vida Sérgio Reoli Episode: "Mamonas Assassinas 2007 Paraíso Tropical Digão Episode: "May 4" Young Hearts Edílson Episode: "October 12" Duas Caras Thief Episode: "December 13" 2008 Caminhos do Coração Adriano Valentin (Draco) Os Mutantes 2009 Promessas de Amor 2010 Bela, A Feia Marcos Episode: "March 4" 2012 Rei Davi Adriel A Grande Família Valdir Episode: "O Pastel de Ouro" Balacobaco André Aragão 2013 Além do Horizonte Álvaro Costa 2014 Os Homens São de Marte Dalton Episode: "Marido Imaginário" Questão de Família Artur Season 2 2015 Além do Tempo Roberto Borghini / Roberto Benini Depois de Tudo Ney Movie 2016 Liberdade, Liberdade Gaspar Em Nome da Lei Jaquinho Movie 2017 Novo Mundo Francisco Gomes da Silva (Chalaça) Entre Irmãs Degas Coelho Movie 2018 Deus Salve o Rei Afonso de Monferrato, Prince of Montemor 2019 Bom Sucesso Marcos Prado Monteiro 2019 Ilha de Ferro Ramiro Season 2 2021 Verdades Secretas 2 Cristiano Season 2 2021 O Amante de Júlia Cássio Movie == References == == Other websites == * Rômulo Estrela on IMDb * Rômulo Estrela on Twitter * Rômulo Estrela on Instagram Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian actors Category:People from Maranhão
